snippet.title: NES Longplay [298] Mad Max
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by JagOfTroy

When you thought it was bad already, it just keeps getting worse. This game is boring, plain and simple.
The placement of obstacles suck, how fast you drive makes it horrible when trying to take out barriers in your way since you'll hit them even after your dynamite blows it up.
Oh.. and of course, it's just a one screen ending that is rather pointless. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
